timeline.message: [polish] Add slow and flakky junit5 tags, see #2506

fix #2506 Switch to GitHub Actions for CI (PR checks)

This commit introduces a PR Check workflow on GitHub Actions, with
several features:

 - accelerate the run by having distinct jobs for slow core tests,
 normal core tests, flakky tests (allowing to re-run tests that are
 tagged `flakky`) and all other tests (including micrometer, benchs,
 reactor-test, ...)
 - workflow will cancel previous runs on the same branch
 - caching enabled

It also adds a `junit-tags` gradle parameter to allow inclusion of
specific JUnit5 tags when running core tests (which is used in the
GHA workflow).

Finally, it removes `.travis.yml` configuration.

See also reactor/reactor#690

Reviewed-in: #2508
Co-authored-by: Eric Bottard <313494+ericbottard@users.noreply.github.com>
